ENTER_SERVER_NAME: 请输入服务器名称 (例如: PZServer)
SERVER_NAME_EXISTS: 错误: 服务器名称 '{0}' 已存在!
PRESS_ENTER_RETURN: Press Enter to return to main menu
ENTER_INSTALL_DIR: 请输入安装目录 (相对于脚本目录，例如: ./PZServer)
Please enter installation directory (relative to script dir, e.g. ./PZServer)
SERVER_ADDED: 服务器 '{0}' 已成功添加!
NO_SERVERS_CONFIGURED: 当前没有配置任何服务器
ENTER_SERVER_NUMBER: 请输入要{0}的服务器编号 (1-{1}, B 返回, Q 退出)
Please enter the server number to {0} (1-{1}, B return, Q exit)
REMOVE_SERVER_INFO: 1. 从配置文件中移除服务器信息
1. Remove server information from configuration file
DELETE_SERVER_DIR: 2. 永久删除服务器安装目录及其中的所有文件
2. Permanently delete server installation directory and all files within
OPERATION_IRREVERSIBLE: 此操作不可逆，请确保您已备份重要数据!
This operation is irreversible, please ensure you have backed up important data!
ENTER_SERVER_NAME_CONFIRM: 请输入服务器名称 '{0}' 以确认删除，或输入任意其他内容取消
Please enter server name '{0}' to confirm deletion, or enter anything else to cancel
SERVER_DELETED: 服务器 '{0}' 已成功删除!
ENTER_NEW_SERVER_NAME: 请输入新的服务器名称 (留空保持不变)
Please enter new server name (leave empty to keep unchanged)
ENTER_NEW_APPID: 请输入新的Steam AppID (留空保持不变)
Please enter new Steam AppID (leave empty to keep unchanged)
ENTER_NEW_DESCRIPTION: 请输入新的服务器描述 (留空保持不变)
Please enter new server description (leave empty to keep unchanged)
ENTER_NEW_INSTALL_DIR: 请输入新的安装目录 (留空保持不变)
Please enter new installation directory (leave empty to keep unchanged)
DEBUG_STEAMCMD_COMMAND: 调试信息 - SteamCMD完整命令:
SERVER_UPDATE_ERROR: 服务器更新过程中出现错误，退出代码: {0}
Error during server update, exit code: {0}
ALL_SERVERS_UPDATED: 所有选定的服务器更新完成！
CONFIG_FILE_NOT_EXIST: 配置文件不存在，正在创建默认配置文件: {0}
Configuration file does not exist, creating default configuration file: {0}
STEAMCMD_NOT_EXIST: SteamCMD does not exist, downloading automatically...
STEAMCMD_DOWNLOAD_ERROR: 下载或解压SteamCMD时发生错误
JQ_MISSING_WARNING: 警告: 未找到jq工具，此工具用于处理JSON格式的配置文件
Warning: jq tool not found, this tool is used to process JSON format configuration files
